detailView.sql: SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN determination ON determination.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID INNER JOIN agent ON determination.DeterminerID = agent.AgentID INNER JOIN taxon ON determination.TaxonID = taxon.TaxonID WHERE determination.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent = true AND %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, locality.LocalityName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.EndDate, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s From collectingevent Inner Join locality ON collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by StartDate

SELECT DISTINCT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, taxon.FullName, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID Inner Join determination ON determination.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by collectionobject.CatalogNumber asc

SELECT DISTINCT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.geographyid = geography.geographyid INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN fragment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN determination ON fragment.FragmentID = determination.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent = true AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, StartDate, StartDatePrecision, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, collector.OrderNumber, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionObjectID in (SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collector.OrderNumber) ORDER BY collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collector.OrderNumber
SELECT t1.TaxonID, t1.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM taxon t1 INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t1.AcceptedID = t2.TaxonID WHERE %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, t.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN fragment f on co.CollectionObjectID = f.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN determination d ON d.FragmentID = f.FragmentID INNER JOIN taxon t ON d.TaxonID = t.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t2.TaxonID = d.PreferredTaxonID WHERE d.TaxonId <> d.PreferredTaxonId AND t.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, deterTax.FullName, acceptTax.FullName, oldTax.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN fragment f on co.FragmentID = f.FragmentID INNER JOIN determination d ON d.FragmentID = f.FragmentID INNER JOIN taxon deterTax ON d.TaxonID = deterTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon acceptTax ON d.PreferredTaxonID = acceptTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon oldTax ON oldTax.AcceptedID = acceptTax.TaxonID AND oldTax.TaxonID != d.TaxonID WHERE co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, FullName, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID Inner Join determination AS DT ON DT.FragmentID = fragment.CollectionObjectID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE DT.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND DT.IsCurrent = true AND %s order by collectionobject.CatalogNumber asc

SELECT agent.AgentID, agentvariant.Name, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID INNER JOIN agentvariant ON agent.AgentID = agentvariant.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by agentvariant.Name asc

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, localitynamealias.Name, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localitynamealias ON locality.LocalityID = localitynamealias.LocalityID WHERE locality.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.EndDate, collectingevent.EndDatePrecision, %s From collectingevent Inner Join collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by StartDate

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, locality.LocalityName, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID WHERE locality.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND collectionobject.collectionmemberid = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY StartDate

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, taxon.fullName, accession.AccessionNumber, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN accession ON accession.accessionid = collectionobject.accessionid INNER JOIN fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN determination ON determination.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE determination.IsCurrent AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY AccessionNumber, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, accessionagent.Role, accession.AccessionNumber, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionagent ON accessionagent.accessionid = accession.accessionid INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = accessionagent.agentid INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY AccessionNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, borrow.InvoiceNumber, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, borrowagent.Role, %s FROM borrow INNER JOIN borrowagent ON borrowagent.borrowid = borrow.borrowid INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = borrowagent.agentid INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY InvoiceNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, appraisal.AppraisalNumber, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, %s FROM appraisal INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = appraisal.agentid INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY AppraisalNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, geologictimeperiod.FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, %s FROM geologictimeperiod INNER JOIN paleocontext ON paleocontext.chronosstratid = geologictimeperiod.geologictimeperiodid INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.paleocontextid = paleocontext.paleocontextid WHERE collectionobject.collectionmemberid = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, collector.OrderNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collector ON collector.collectingeventid = collectingevent.collectingeventid INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = collector.agentid WHERE %s ORDER BY LastName, FirstName, StartDate, StationFieldNumber

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, collectingtrip.CollectingTripName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingtrip ON collectingtrip.CollectingTripID = collectingevent.CollectingTripID WHERE %s ORDER BY CollectingTripName, StartDate, StationFieldNumber

SELECT exchangein.ExchangeInID, exchangein.ExchangeDate, exchangein.DescriptionOfMaterial, agent.Abbreviation, %s FROM exchangein INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = exchangein.ReceivedFromOrganizationID WHERE %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate, DescriptionOfMaterial

SELECT exchangeout.ExchangeOutID, exchangeout.ExchangeDate, exchangeout.DescriptionOfMaterial, agent.Abbreviation, %s FROM exchangeout INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = exchangeout.SentToOrganizationID WHERE %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate, DescriptionOfMaterial

SELECT DISTINCT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent on collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY FullName,StartDate

SELECT DISTINCT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent on collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.lLocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID WHERE %s AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID ORDER BY FullName,collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, gift.GiftNumber, %s FROM gift INNER JOIN giftpreparation ON giftpreparation.GiftID = gift.GiftID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparatioNID = giftpreparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.PrepTypeID = preparation.PrepTypeID INNER JOIN fragment on fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY GiftNumber,collectionobject.CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, giftagent.Role, gift.GiftNumber, %s FROM gift INNER JOIN giftagent ON giftagent.GiftID = gift.GifTID INNER JOIN agent on agent.AgentID = giftagent.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY GiftNumber,Role,LastName,FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, loan.LoanNumber, %s FROM loan INNER JOIN loanpreparation ON loanpreparation.LoanID = loan.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparationID = loanpreparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.PrepTypeID = preparation.PrepTypeID INNER JOIN fragment on fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID WHERE %s ORDER BY LoanNumber,collectionobject.CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, loanagent.Role, loan.LoanNumber, %s FROM loan INNER JOIN loanagent ON loanagent.loanid = loan.loanid INNER JOIN agent on agent.agentid = loanagent.agentid WHERE %s ORDER BY LoanNumber,Role,LastName,FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, lithostrat.FullName, %s FROM lithostrat INNER JOIN paleocontext ON paleocontext.LithoStratID = lithostrat.LithoStratID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.PaleoContextID = paleocontext.PaleoContextID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN accessionauthorization ON accessionauthorization.PermitID = permit.PermitID INNER JOIN accession ON accession.AccessionID = accessionauthorization.AccessionID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = accession.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = permit.IssuedToID INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = permit.IssuedByID INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, project.ProjectName, project.ProjectNumber, %s FROM project INNER JOIN project_colobj ON project_colobj.projectid = project.projectid INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.collectionobjectid = project_colobj.collectionobjectid WHERE collectionobject.CollectionmemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY ProjectName, ProjectNumber, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, project.ProjectName, project.ProjectNumber, %s FROM project INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = project.ProjectAgentID INNER JOIN agent_discipline on agent_discipline.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY ProjectName, ProjectNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = repositoryagreement.AgentID INNER JOIN agent_discipline on agent_discipline.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY RepositoryAgreementNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT DISTINCT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, storage.FullName, %s FROM storage INNER JOIN preparation ON preparation.StorageID = storage.StorageID INNER JOIN fragment ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, IsCurrent, FullName, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID Inner Join determination AS DT ON DT.FragmentID = collectionobject.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE DT.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND %s order by FullName, CatalogNumber

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, SampleNumber, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID Inner Join preparation ON preparation.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID WHERE preparation.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.CatalogNumber, preparation.SampleNumber

SELECT referencework.ReferenceWorkID, referenceworkvariant.Name, referencework.Text1, %s FROM referencework INNER JOIN referenceworkvariant ON referencework.ReferenceWorkID = referenceworkvariant.ReferenceWorkID WHERE %s order by referenceworkvariant.Name asc

SELECT accession.AccessionID, accession.AccessionNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionattachment ON accession.AccessionID = accessionattachment.AccessionID INNER JOIN attachment ON accessionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, attachment.Title, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agentattachment ON agent.AgentID = agentattachment.AgentID INNER JOIN attachment ON agentattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingeventattachment ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectingeventattachment.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectingeventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectionobjectattachment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = collectionobjectattachment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectionobjectattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID, conservdescription.ShortDesc, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservdescription INNER JOIN conservdescriptionattachment ON conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID = conservdescriptionattachment.ConservDescriptionID INNER JOIN attachment ON conservdescriptionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT conservevent.ConservEventID, conservevent.ExamDate, conservevent.TreatmentCompDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservevent INNER JOIN conserveventattachment ON conservevent.ConservEventID = conserveventattachment.ConservEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON conserveventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID, fieldnotebook.Name, fieldnotebook.StartDate, fieldnotebook.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebook INNER JOIN fieldnotebookattachment ON fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID = fieldnotebookattachment.FieldNotebookID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID, fieldnotebookpage.PageNumber, fieldnotebookpage.ScanDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpage INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpageattachment ON fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID = fieldnotebookpageattachment.FieldNotebookPageID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpageattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID, fieldnotebookpageset.OrderNumber, fieldnotebookpageset.StartDate, fieldnotebookpageset.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpageset INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpagesetattachment ON fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID = fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.FieldNotebookPageSetID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, attachment.Title, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localityattachment ON locality.LocalityID = localityattachment.LocalityID INNER JOIN attachment ON localityattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, permit.IssuedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN permitattachment ON permit.PermitID = permitattachment.PermitID INNER JOIN attachment ON permitattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT preparation.PreparationID, preparation.PreparedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM preparation INNER JOIN preparationattachment ON preparation.PreparationID = preparationattachment.PreparationID INNER JOIN attachment ON preparationattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, repositoryagreement.StartDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN repositoryagreementattachment ON repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID = repositoryagreementattachment.RepositoryAgreementID INNER JOIN attachment ON repositoryagreementattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, taxon.TaxonomicSerialNumber, attachment.Title, attachment.OrigFilename, %s FROM taxon INNER JOIN taxonattachment ON taxon.TaxonID = taxonattachment.TaxonID INNER JOIN attachment ON taxonattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.FirstName, agent.LastName, agent.EMail, address.Address, address.City, address.State, address.Postalcode, address.Country FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN address ON agent.AgentID = address.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) GROUP BY agent.AgentID ORDER BY agent.LastName, agent.FirstName

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, agent.LastName, permit.IssuedDate, permit.StartDate, permit.EndDate, permit.RenewalDate, permit.Type FROM permit LEFT JOIN agent ON permit.IssuedByID = agent.AgentID WHERE (%s) ORDER BY permit.PermitNumber
SELECT AccessionID, AccessionNumber, Status, Type, DateAccessioned, DateReceived FROM accession WHERE (%s) ORDER BY AccessionNumber

SELECT geography.GeographyID, geography.Name, geography.FullName, geographytreedefitem.Name FROM geography INNER JOIN geographytreedefitem ON geography.GeographyTreeDefItemID = geographytreedefitem.GeographyTreeDefItemID WHERE geography.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY geography.RankID, geography.Name
select PrepTypeID, Name from preptype where CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY Name
SELECT DisciplineID, Type, Name FROM discipline WHERE (%s) ORDER BY Name
SELECT CatalogNumberingSchemeID, SchemeName, IsNumericOnly FROM catalognumberingscheme WHERE (%s) ORDER BY SchemeName
SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.RankID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName FROM taxon WHERE taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY taxon.RankID, taxon.Name
SELECT AgentID, FirstName, LastName, MiddleInitial FROM agent WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY LastName, FirstName, MiddleInitial
SELECT StorageID, FullName, Text2, Text1 FROM storage WHERE StorageTreeDefID = STORTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY FullName
SELECT GeologicTimePeriodID, FullName FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY FullName
SELECT LithoStratID, FullName FROM lithostrat WHERE LithoStratTreeDefID = LITHOTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY FullName
SELECT PaleoContextID, TopDistance, DistanceUnits FROM paleocontext WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY TopDistance

SELECT DISTINCT loan.LoanID, LoanNumber, LoanDate, CurrentDueDate, OriginalDueDate FROM loan INNER JOIN loanpreparation ON loan.LoanID = loanpreparation.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation ON loanpreparation.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN fragment ON preparation.PreparationID = fragment.FragmentID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN collection ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collection.CollectionID INNER JOIN collectiontype ON collection.DisciplineID = collectiontype.DisciplineID INNER JOIN specifyuser ON collectiontype.SpecifyUserID = specifyuser.SpecifyUserID WHERE specifyuser.SpecifyUserID = SPECIFYUSERID AND loan.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (not (currentduedate is null)) AND (IsClosed = false or IsClosed is null) AND datediff(CURDATE(), currentduedate) > 0 ORDER BY loan.LoanDate
SELECT LocalityID, LocalityName,Latitude1,Longitude1 FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY LocalityName
SELECT AttachmentID, OrigFilename FROM attachment WHERE (%s) ORDER BY OrigFilename
SELECT CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber FROM collectionobject WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY CatalogNumber
SELECT CollectingEventID, StationFieldNumber, StartDate, StartDatePrecision FROM collectingevent WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY StartDate, StationFieldNumber
SELECT GeologicTimePeriodID, FullName FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND geologictimeperiod.IsBioStrat = 1 AND (%s) ORDER BY Name
SELECT JournalID, JournalName, JournalAbbreviation, ISSN, GUID FROM journal WHERE (%s) ORDER BY JournalAbbreviation
SELECT AppraisalID, AppraisalNumber FROM appraisal WHERE (%s) ORDER BY AppraisalNumber
SELECT ReferenceWorkID, Title FROM referencework WHERE (%s) ORDER BY Title
SELECT CollectingTripID, CollectingTripName, StartDate FROM collectingtrip WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY CollectingTripName
SELECT DivisionID, Name FROM division WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY Name
SELECT ProjectID, ProjectName, ProjectNumber FROM project WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY ProjectName
SELECT RepositoryAgreementID, RepositoryAgreementNumber, StartDate FROM repositoryagreement WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY RepositoryAgreementNumber
select ExsiccataID, Title from exsiccata where (%s) ORDER BY Title
select ContainerID, Name from container where CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.Abbreviation, address.Address, address.City, address.State, address.Postalcode, address.Country FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN address ON agent.AgentID = address.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) GROUP BY agent.AgentID ORDER BY agent.LastName, agent.FirstName
